name: In Play Films
overview:
In Play Films is a limited liability company based out of Seattle, Washington, currently specializing in the creation of no budget motion pictures. The company is run by a young and very successful group of individuals that specialize in all facets of the entertainment industry; writing, directing, producing, business development and distribution.

In Play Films was created by Kevin Nesgoda in the spring of 2008 as a sole proprietorship for creating short films, script consulting and general help on other local productions in the greater Seattle area.

After numerous early successes with shorts, consultations and other productions the company is now moving forward with the creation of no budget to ultra low budget features and elongated shorts. The goal in the very near feature is to move up to low budget features and evolve from there.

In Play Films will also be taking a portion of the funds it gains and redistributing them into the community by helping the truly needy through donations, volunteer efforts, working with local nonprofit organizations and creating films that hold a message.
